text: Ivarkal allahvai matikka ventiya muraiyil matikkavillai enenil avarkal, "allah enta oru manitar mitum e(nta vetat)taiyum irakkavillai" enru kurukinranar; avarkalitattil nir kurum; "pirakacamanatakavum, manitarkalukku valikattiyakavum musa kontuvantare anta vettai irakkiyavan yar? Atanai ninkal tanittani etukalaka akki, avarril cilavarrai velippatuttukirirkal; perumpalanavarrai maraittum vitukirirkal; (avvetattin mulamakave) ninkalum unkal mutataiyarkalum ariyamal iruntavaikalaiyellam karrukkotukkappattirkal." (Napiye! Melum) nir kuruviraka"allahtan (atai irakkivaittan)" pinpu avarkalait tam vinana (tarkkat)til vilaiyatikkontirukkumaru vittuvituviraka
